example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (NP-TPC-2 (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM العذاب)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON الذي)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يفرض) (NP-OBJ (NP (IVSUFF_DO:3MS ه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1))) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM المستعمر)) (PP (PREP ك) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN رادع))))))) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يتحول) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-ADV (NOUN لدى) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الشعوب))) (PP-CLR (PREP الى) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN حل)) (CONJ و) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN طريقة) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN حياة))))) (PUNC ,) (SBAR-ADV (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC خصوصا)) (SUB_CONJ اذا) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS تضاءل) (NP-SBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الفرق)) (NP-ADV (-NONE- *ICH*-3))) (PP-DIR (PREP الى) (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الدرجة)))) (NP-ADV-3 (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بين) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الموت) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الحياة))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: To such a degree of life between death

example.arg: الى هذه الدرجة بين الموت الحياة
